name: Flippy World
description:
FLIPPY WORLD

Flippy World is Game made for the Brackeys Game Jam, we will continue this Game in the future and release it for Android!

W/S To move forward/backward | A/D to rotate Left/Right | Left Click to break/Attack | E to bring up Crafting Menu | ESCAPE to Pause

Game by: Cottontail Studio

Assets by: Zayn

Sound SFX by: Zapsplat

Game made with: Unity3d

User Interface Made With: Adobe illustrator

Enjoy and leave your feedback on our Discord Server!
